channel.title: Hey guys - MySQL
channel.description:
So i create a table in my database called "Skills". My server now connects to mySql when it runs, so how would i go about loading the skills in the table?
ResultSet group = statement.executeQuery("SELECT * FROM Skills")
Anything to do with that? I don't know, thats just a "guess", any help is appreciated.
Thanks!
